Marie Edwards Johnson-Calloway (April 10, 1920 na February 11, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọhịa nké eserese na ngwakọta mgbasa ozi.
A mụrụ Marie Edwards na Pimlico, Baltimore, ónyé Africa America Johnson-Calloway gara kọleji ndị nkụzi nke Coppin State.  Edwards kụziri na Baltimore School District ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1952, ọ nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Arts na Morgan State College, Baltimore, Maryland, na agụmakwụkwọ nka.
N'afọ 1968 ọ natara Master of Arts na eserese site na Mahadum San Jose State dị ka ónyé nkụzi nwéré ahụmahụ na Graduate Studies
Ọ kụziri na mahadum na kọleji dị na Bay Area ruo mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na nkụzi na 1983.
Johnson-Calloway arụwo ọrụ na Bay Area Women Artists nke Northern California na ọrụ obodo

Ebe ngosi nka Oakland so n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwere ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya. Johnson-Calloway akụzikwaara na Mahadum San Francisco State na California College of Arts and Crafts Alụrụ di ugboro abụọ (Arthur Johnson, MD na Charles Calloway
M.D.), o nwere ụmụ abụọ (nwa nwanyị April Watkins, na nwa nwoke, Art Johnson), na ụmụ ụmụ anọ, ma bírí na Oakland, California
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke San Jose nke NAACP, ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ikike ọbọdọ.
Johnson-Calloway nwụrụ na Febụwarị 2018 mgbè ọ dị afọ 97.
